titleStmt.title: Brachigraphy, post-writ, or, The art of short-writing The summe whereof is couched into one table, plainely demonstrating the whole method of the inuention. By W. Folkingham his Maiesties post of Stamford.
titleStmt.author: Folkingham, W. (William)

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The art of brachigraphy.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
